attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Privatisation TRAINS TAKE THEM OUT OF THE HANDS OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP, AND PUT THEM BACK INTO THE HANDS OF GOVERMENT AND PUPLIC OWNERSHIP, SO THERE CAN BE DECENT FARES INSTEAD OF RIDICULOUS FARE RISES ALL THE TIME, AND CONSTANT DELAYS,

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
